testcase.classname: users should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "test862000@gmail.com" and "password123"....................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home Page......................passed

testcase.classname: users should be able to login to the system

testcase.classname: User Reset Password
testcase.name: User could reset his password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user click on Forgot password..........................................passed And user enter his email....................................................passed And user click on Recover button............................................passed Then Message Email with instructions has been sent to user is displayed.....passed

testcase.classname: User Reset Password
testcase.name: User could not reset his password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user click on Forgot password..........................................passed And user enter error email..................................................passed And user click on Recover button............................................passed Then Red Message Email not found is displayed...............................passed

testcase.classname: User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: User changes the currency from USD to Euro
testcase.system-out: Given User redirects to Home page...........................................passed When User select Euro from drop down list...................................passed Then Currency of product is changed into Euro...............................passed

testcase.classname: Users can search for any product using product name or using SKU
testcase.name: User can search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given User redirects to Home page...........................................passed When User search using product name "book"..................................passed And User click on Search button.............................................passed Then Products that appears will be related to the product name "book".......passed

testcase.classname: Users can search for any product using product name or using SKU
testcase.name: User can search for product using sku
testcase.system-out: Given User redirects to Home page...........................................passed When User search with product sku "SCI_FAITH"...............................passed And User click on Search button.............................................passed Then Products that appears will be related to the product sku "SCI_FAITH"...passed

testcase.system-out: Given User redirects to Home page...........................................passed When User hover on main categories then click on sub categories.............passed Then User will be navigated to a page of subCategory that he selected......passed
